title: Fusion finalising roster for Oceanic Open Ladder- Fast track into the Oceanic Challenger Series!
body:
Luigi here, owner of Fusion,

With the first of week of Oceanic Open Ladder (OOL) looming this weekend, with the top 5 teams making it into the Challenger Series, Fusion is gauging last minute interest. If you want the opportunity to take your game to the next level, this is your chance. If you are dedicated, motivated, and have a competitive mindset contact me on League, or email me with your details. Look forward to hearing from you.

Open roster positions:
TOP-
MID-

Diamond 5 and above
Finalising roster over the next 48 hours.

Add me for any queries, cheers.

IGN: Fusion Luigi
Email: luigi.bot19@gmail.com

replies.body: I'm fairly certain that the top 5 teams make it into the Challenger Series Wildcard Qualifiers, with the winning team in that taking a spot in the OCS.

Feel free to add me in client, but for the immediate tournament this weekend, d5 is a must. 
However, in saying that, I'm open to allowing room for development over the coming weeks.
Is the d5 a must? I've very interested in this but my skill level is around plat 5-3. I improve very quickly with help.
